resources.string:
TWRP Recovery Installer for Xperia 

 This app downloads latest TWRP image for your phone and flashes it to the FOTAKernel partition. 

 All custom ROMs (FXP, AOKP, CM, PAC, AOSPA etc) support the extract_elf_ramdisk method in which the recovery present inside the FOTAKernel partition is used. This recovery will work regardless of if the recovery in kernel is working or not. 

 NOTE: The recovery.img files are hosted on goo.im so when downloading, first just an html page is downloaded. Open the page, and come back to the app and press the download button for the real download of recovery to begin. (~10mb size)
